fixed_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 76.0%/79.8%/83.6% of Attack. If main target's HP is below 50%, chance of insta-kill.
fixed_skill.name: Samsara

innate_skill.desc: Increase the success rate of insta-kill skills by 5.4%.
innate_skill.name: Divine Guidance III

innate_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to 1 foe equal to 41.4/43.5/45.5% of Attack, ignoring their Defense. Restore user's HP equal to 41.4/43.5/45.5% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Life Drain

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 20.8%. Increase Bless damage by 48% when attacking foes with less than 50% HP.
passive_skill.name: Miraculous Salvation

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 20.8%. Increase Bless damage by 55% when attacking foes with less than 50% HP.
passive_skill.name: Miraculous Salvation I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 20.8%. Increase Bless damage by 61% when attacking foes with less than 50% HP. After dealing damage to foes with less than 50% HP, restore user's HP by 12% of Attack.
passive_skill.name: Miraculous Salvation II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
